content: You are a maintenance work order sentence paraphraser.

Paraphrase the following sentence 5 times.
steering cylinder bearings have excess play
You must include the following keywords: steering cylinder bearings, excess play
You may change the sentence from passive to active voice or vice versa.
Avoid verbosity and use minimal stop words.
The sentence can have a maximum of 8 words.

1. steering cylinder bearings exhibit excess play
2. steering cylinder bearings are showing excess play
3. excess play in steering cylinder bearings
4. bearings in steering cylinder have excess play
5. steering cylinder bearings show excess play
